import React, {useState} from 'react' import "./styles/CribsFilter.css" function CribsFilter({handleAdd}) { const [location, setLocation] = useState("") const [area, setArea] = useState("") const [bed, setBed] = useState("") const [bath, setBath] = useState("") const [price, setPrice] = useState("") const [images, setImages] = useState("") function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); const imagesArray = images.split(", ") fetch("http://localhost:3000/cribs", { method: 'POST', headers: {"Content-Type": "application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify({ location: location, area: area, bed: bed, bath: bath, price: price, images: images }) }).then(response => response.json()) .then(newCrib=>handleAdd(newCrib)) } return ( <>
LIST YOUR CRIB
setLocation(e.target.value)} />
setArea(e.target.value)} />
setArea(e.target.value)} />
setArea(e.target.value)} />
setArea(e.target.value)} />
setImages(e.target.value)} placeholder="Image-1"/> setImages(e.target.value)} placeholder="Image-2"/> setImages(e.target.value)} placeholder="Image-3"/> setImages(e.target.value)} placeholder="Image-4"/>
) } export default CribsFilter
